title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 202.62 - Payment of eminent domain award to other than the named awardee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 202.62 - Payment of eminent domain award to other than the named awardee

State Regulations

On all applications for payment of awards in
eminent domain proceedings by parties other than the party named in the decree, the applicant shall give notice of its motion to all parties with an interest
in the award. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
202.62

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
